001/*

005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter;
007
008import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonGenerator;
009import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonParser;
010import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.jsonFormatVisitors.JsonFormatTypes;
011
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.AbstractDataTypeAdapter;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidValueForCastFunctionException;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IBooleanItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.INumericItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IStringItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
020
021import java.io.IOException;
022import java.util.List;
023
024import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
025
026import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
027
028public class BooleanAdapter
029    extends AbstractDataTypeAdapter<Boolean, IBooleanItem> {
030  @NonNull
031  private static final List<QName> NAMES = ObjectUtils.notNull(
032      List.of(new QName(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH.toASCIIString(), "boolean")));
033
034  BooleanAdapter() {
035    super(Boolean.class);
036  }
037
038  @Override
039  public List<QName> getNames() {
040    return NAMES;
041  }
042
043  @Override
044  public JsonFormatTypes getJsonRawType() {
045    return JsonFormatTypes.BOOLEAN;
046  }
047
048  @SuppressWarnings("null")
049  @Override
050  public Boolean parse(String value) {
051    return Boolean.valueOf(value);
052  }
053
054  @Override
055  public Boolean parse(JsonParser parser) throws IOException {
056    Boolean value = parser.getBooleanValue();
057    // skip over value
058    parser.nextToken();
059    return value;
060  }
061
062  @Override
063  public void writeJsonValue(Object value, JsonGenerator generator)
064      throws IOException {
065    try {
066      generator.writeBoolean((Boolean) value);
067    } catch (ClassCastException ex) {
068      throw new IOException(ex);
069    }
070  }
071
072  @Override
073  public Boolean copy(Object obj) {
074    // the value is immutable
075    return (Boolean) obj;
076  }
077
078  @Override
079  public Class<IBooleanItem> getItemClass() {
080    return IBooleanItem.class;
081  }
082
083  @Override
084  public IBooleanItem newItem(Object value) {
085    Boolean item = toValue(value);
086    return IBooleanItem.valueOf(item);
087  }
088
089  @Override
090  protected IBooleanItem castInternal(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item) {
091    IBooleanItem retval;
092    if (item instanceof INumericItem) {
093      retval = castToBoolean((INumericItem) item);
094    } else if (item instanceof IStringItem) {
095      retval = castToBoolean((IStringItem) item);
096    } else {
097      try {
098        retval = castToBoolean(item.asStringItem());
099      } catch (IllegalStateException ex) {
100        throw new InvalidValueForCastFunctionException(ex.getLocalizedMessage(), ex);
101      }
102    }
103    return retval;
104  }
105
106  /**
107   * Cast the provided numeric value to a boolean. Any non-zero value will be
108   * {@code true}, or {@code false} otherwise.
109   *
110   * @param item
111   *          the item to cast
112   * @return {@code true} if the item value is non-zero, or {@code false}
113   *         otherwise
114   */
115  @NonNull
116  protected IBooleanItem castToBoolean(@NonNull INumericItem item) {
117    return IBooleanItem.valueOf(item.toEffectiveBoolean());
118  }
119
120  /**
121   * If the string is a numeric value, treat it as so. Otherwise parse the value
122   * as a boolean string.
123   *
124   * @param item
125   *          the item to cast
126   * @return the effective boolean value of the string
127   * @throws InvalidValueForCastFunctionException
128   *           if the provided item cannot be cast to a boolean value by any means
129   */
130  @NonNull
131  protected IBooleanItem castToBoolean(@NonNull IStringItem item) {
132    IBooleanItem retval;
133    try {
134      INumericItem numeric = INumericItem.cast(item);
135      retval = castToBoolean(numeric);
136    } catch (InvalidValueForCastFunctionException ex) {
137      retval = super.castInternal(item);
138    }
139    return retval;
140  }
141
142}
